patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -0,0 +1,56 @@
+import { createRouter, createWebHashHistory } from 'vue-router'
+import HomeView from '../views/HomeView.vue'
+import { localGet, pathMap } from '@/utils'
+
+const router = createRouter({
+  history: createWebHashHistory(),
+  //history: createWebHashHistory(import.meta.env.BASE_URL),
+  routes: [
+    {
+      path: '/',
+      name: 'home',
+      component: HomeView
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/about',
+      name: 'about',
+      // route level code-splitting
+      // this generates a separate chunk (About.[hash].js) for this route
+      // which is lazy-loaded when the route is visited.
+      component: () => import('../views/Item.vue')
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/OverView',
+      name: 'OverView',
+      // route level code-splitting
+      // this generates a separate chunk (About.[hash].js) for this route
+      // which is lazy-loaded when the route is visited.
+      component: () => import('../views/OverView.vue')
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/Item',
+      name: 'Item',
+      component: () => import('../views/Item.vue')
+    },
+  ]
+})
+
+router.beforeEach((to, from, next) => {
+  if (to.path == '/login') {
+    // 如果路径是 /login 则正常执行
+    next()
+  } else {
+    // 如果不是 /login，判断是否有 token
+    if (!localGet('token')) {
+      // 如果没有，则跳至登录页面
+      next({ path: '/login' })
+    } else {
+      // 否则继续执行
+      next()
+    }
+  }
+  state.currentPath = to.path
+  document.title = pathMap[to.name]
+})
+
+export default router

@@ -0,0 +1,63 @@
+import { createRouter, createWebHashHistory } from 'vue-router'
+import HomeView from '../views/HomeView.vue'
+import { useLogin } from '../stores/login'
+const loginStore = useLogin()
+
+const router = createRouter({
+  history: createWebHashHistory(),
+  //history: createWebHashHistory(import.meta.env.BASE_URL),
+  routes: [
+    {
+      path: '/',
+      name: 'home',
+      component: HomeView
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/login',
+      name: 'login',
+      component: () => import('../views/Login.vue')
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/about',
+      name: 'about',
+      // route level code-splitting
+      // this generates a separate chunk (About.[hash].js) for this route
+      // which is lazy-loaded when the route is visited.
+      component: () => import('../views/Item.vue')
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/OverView',
+      name: 'OverView',
+      // route level code-splitting
+      // this generates a separate chunk (About.[hash].js) for this route
+      // which is lazy-loaded when the route is visited.
+      component: () => import('../views/OverView.vue')
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/Item',
+      name: 'Item',
+      component: () => import('../views/Item.vue')
+    },
+  ]
+})
+
+router.beforeEach((to, from, next) => {
+  if (to.path == '/login') {
+    // 如果路径是 /login 则正常执行
+    next()
+  } else {
+    console.log('loginStore' , loginStore.token)
+    // // 如果不是 /login，判断是否有 token
+    // if (!localGet('token')) {
+    //   // 如果没有，则跳至登录页面
+    //   next({ path: '/login' })
+    // } else {
+    //   // 否则继续执行
+    //   next()
+    // }
+  }
+  // state.currentPath = to.path
+  // document.title = pathMap[to.name]
+})
+
+export default router

+import { createRouter, createWebHashHistory } from 'vue-router'
+import HomeView from '../views/HomeView.vue'
+
+
+const router = createRouter({
+  history: createWebHashHistory(),
+  //history: createWebHashHistory(import.meta.env.BASE_URL),
+  routes: [
+    {
+      path: '/',
+      name: 'home',
+      component: HomeView
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/login',
+      name: 'login',
+      component: () => import('../views/Login.vue')
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/about',
+      name: 'about',
+      // route level code-splitting
+      // this generates a separate chunk (About.[hash].js) for this route
+      // which is lazy-loaded when the route is visited.
+      component: () => import('../views/Item.vue')
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/OverView',
+      name: 'OverView',
+      // route level code-splitting
+      // this generates a separate chunk (About.[hash].js) for this route
+      // which is lazy-loaded when the route is visited.
+      component: () => import('../views/OverView.vue')
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/Item',
+      name: 'Item',
+      component: () => import('../views/Item.vue')
+    },
+  ]
+})
+import Cookies from 'js-cookie';
+import { useLogin } from '../stores/login'
+
+router.beforeEach((to, from, next) => {
+  const loginStore = useLogin();
+
+  const token = loginStore.token;
+
+  if (to.path == '/login') {
+    // 如果路径是 /login 则正常执行
+    next()
+  } else {
+
+    console.log('token' , token)
+    // // 如果不是 /login，判断是否有 token

+    //   next()
+    // }
+  }
+  // state.currentPath = to.path
+  // document.title = pathMap[to.name]
+})
+
+export default router

===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -0,0 +1,71 @@
+import { createRouter, createWebHashHistory } from 'vue-router'
+import HomeView from '../views/HomeView.vue'
+
+
+const router = createRouter({
+  history: createWebHashHistory(),
+  //history: createWebHashHistory(import.meta.env.BASE_URL),
+  routes: [
+    {
+      path: '/',
+      name: 'home',
+      component: HomeView
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/Register',
+      name: 'Register',
+      component: () => import('../views/Register.vue')
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/login',
+      name: 'login',
+      component: () => import('../views/Login.vue')
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/about',
+      name: 'about',
+      // route level code-splitting
+      // this generates a separate chunk (About.[hash].js) for this route
+      // which is lazy-loaded when the route is visited.
+      component: () => import('../views/Item.vue')
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/OverView',
+      name: 'OverView',
+      // route level code-splitting
+      // this generates a separate chunk (About.[hash].js) for this route
+      // which is lazy-loaded when the route is visited.
+      component: () => import('../views/OverView.vue')
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/Item',
+      name: 'Item',
+      component: () => import('../views/Item.vue')
+    },
+  ]
+})
+import Cookies from 'js-cookie';
+import { useLogin } from '../stores/login'
+
+router.beforeEach((to, from, next) => {
+  const loginStore = useLogin();
+
+  const token = loginStore.token;
+
+  if (to.path == '/login') {
+    next()
+  } else {
+    // 如果不是 /login，判断是否有 token
+    if (!token) {
+      // 如果没有，则跳至登录页面
+      next({ path: '/login' })
+    } else {
+      // 否则继续执行
+      next()
+    }
+  }
+  // state.currentPath = to.path
+  // document.title = pathMap[to.name]
+})
+
+export default router

===================================================================
--- 
+++

+    },
+    {
+      path: '/login',
+      name: 'login',
+      component: () => import('../views/Login.vue')
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/about',
+      name: 'about',
+      // route level code-splitting
+      // this generates a separate chunk (About.[hash].js) for this route
+      // which is lazy-loaded when the route is visited.
+      component: () => import('../views/Item.vue')
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/OverView',
+      name: 'OverView',
+      // route level code-splitting
+      // this generates a separate chunk (About.[hash].js) for this route
+      // which is lazy-loaded when the route is visited.
+      component: () => import('../views/OverView.vue')
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/Item',
+      name: 'Item',
+      component: () => import('../views/Item.vue')
+    },
+  ]
+})
+import Cookies from 'js-cookie';
+import { useLogin } from '../stores/login'
+
+router.beforeEach((to, from, next) => {
+  const loginStore = useLogin();
+
+  const token = loginStore.token;
+
+  if (to.path == '/login') {
+    next()
+  } else {
+    // 如果不是 /login，判断是否有 token
+    if (!token) {

+      next()

+  }
+  // state.currentPath = to.path

+})
+
+export default router

@@ -0,0 +1,73 @@
+import { createRouter, createWebHashHistory } from 'vue-router'
+import HomeView from '../views/HomeView.vue'
+
+
+const router = createRouter({
+  history: createWebHashHistory(),
+  //history: createWebHashHistory(import.meta.env.BASE_URL),
+  routes: [
+    {
+      path: '/',
+      name: 'home',
+      component: HomeView
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/Register',
+      name: 'Register',
+      component: () => import('../views/Register.vue')
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/login',
+      name: 'login',
+      component: () => import('../views/Login.vue')
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/about',
+      name: 'about',
+      // route level code-splitting
+      // this generates a separate chunk (About.[hash].js) for this route
+      // which is lazy-loaded when the route is visited.
+      component: () => import('../views/Item.vue')
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/OverView',
+      name: 'OverView',
+      // route level code-splitting
+      // this generates a separate chunk (About.[hash].js) for this route
+      // which is lazy-loaded when the route is visited.
+      component: () => import('../views/OverView.vue')
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/Item',
+      name: 'Item',
+      component: () => import('../views/Item.vue')
+    },
+  ]
+})
+import Cookies from 'js-cookie';
+import { useLogin } from '../stores/login'
+
+router.beforeEach((to, from, next) => {
+  const loginStore = useLogin();
+
+  const token = loginStore.token;
+  console.log(loginStore)
+
+  if (to.path == '/login') {
+    next()
+  } else {
+    // 如果不是 /login，判断是否有 token
+    if (!token) {
+      // 如果没有，则跳至登录页面
+      next({ path: '/login' })
+    } else {
+      // 否则继续执行
+      console.log('66666')
+      next()
+    }
+  }
+  // state.currentPath = to.path
+  // document.title = pathMap[to.name]
+})
+
+export default router

@@ -0,0 +1,75 @@
+import { createRouter, createWebHashHistory } from 'vue-router'
+import HomeView from '../views/HomeView.vue'
+
+
+const router = createRouter({
+  history: createWebHashHistory(),
+  //history: createWebHashHistory(import.meta.env.BASE_URL),
+  routes: [
+    {
+      path: '/',
+      name: 'home',
+      component: HomeView
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/Register',
+      name: 'Register',
+      component: () => import('../views/Register.vue')
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/login',
+      name: 'login',
+      component: () => import('../views/Login.vue')
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/about',
+      name: 'about',
+      // route level code-splitting
+      // this generates a separate chunk (About.[hash].js) for this route
+      // which is lazy-loaded when the route is visited.
+      component: () => import('../views/Item.vue')
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/OverView',
+      name: 'OverView',
+      // route level code-splitting
+      // this generates a separate chunk (About.[hash].js) for this route
+      // which is lazy-loaded when the route is visited.
+      component: () => import('../views/OverView.vue')
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/Item',
+      name: 'Item',
+      component: () => import('../views/Item.vue')
+    },
+  ]
+})
+import Cookies from 'js-cookie';
+import { useLogin } from '../stores/login'
+
+router.beforeEach((to, from, next) => {
+  const loginStore = useLogin();
+
+  const token = Cookies.get('token');
+  console.log('token' , token)
+  if (to.path == '/login') {
+    next()
+    console.log('8888888888888')
+  } else {
+    // 如果不是 /login，判断是否有 token
+    if (!token) {
+      // 如果没有，则跳至登录页面
+      next({ path: '/login' })
+      console.log('9999999')
+
+    } else {
+      // 否则继续执行
+      console.log('66666')
+      next()
+    }
+  }
+  // state.currentPath = to.path
+  // document.title = pathMap[to.name]
+})
+
+export default router

@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+import { createRouter, createWebHashHistory } from 'vue-router'
+import HomeView from '../views/HomeView.vue'
+
+
+const router = createRouter({
+  history: createWebHashHistory(),
+  //history: createWebHashHistory(import.meta.env.BASE_URL),
+  routes: [
+    {
+      path: '/',
+      name: 'home',
+      component: HomeView
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/Register',
+      name: 'Register',
+      component: () => import('../views/Register.vue')
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/login',
+      name: 'login',
+      component: () => import('../views/Login.vue')
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/about',
+      name: 'about',
+      // route level code-splitting
+      // this generates a separate chunk (About.[hash].js) for this route
+      // which is lazy-loaded when the route is visited.
+      component: () => import('../views/Item.vue')
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/OverView',
+      name: 'OverView',
+      // route level code-splitting
+      // this generates a separate chunk (About.[hash].js) for this route
+      // which is lazy-loaded when the route is visited.
+      component: () => import('../views/OverView.vue')
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/Item',
+      name: 'Item',
+      component: () => import('../views/Item.vue')
+    },
+  ]
+})
+import Cookies from 'js-cookie';
+router.beforeEach((to, from, next) => {
+  const token = Cookies.get('token');
+  if (to.path == '/login') {
+    next()
+  } else {
+    // 如果不是 /login，判断是否有 token
+    if (!token) {
+      // 如果没有，则跳至登录页面
+      next({ path: '/login' })
+      console.log('9999999')
+    } else {
+      // 否则继续执行
+      console.log('66666')
+      next()
+    }
+  }
+})
+
+export default router

@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+import { createRouter, createWebHashHistory } from 'vue-router'
+import HomeView from '../views/HomeView.vue'
+
+
+const router = createRouter({
+  history: createWebHashHistory(),
+  //history: createWebHashHistory(import.meta.env.BASE_URL),
+  routes: [
+    {
+      path: '/',
+      name: 'home',
+      component: HomeView
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/Register',
+      name: 'Register',
+      component: () => import('../views/Register.vue')
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/login',
+      name: 'login',
+      component: () => import('../views/Login.vue')
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/about',
+      name: 'about',
+      // route level code-splitting
+      // this generates a separate chunk (About.[hash].js) for this route
+      // which is lazy-loaded when the route is visited.
+      component: () => import('../views/Item.vue')
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/OverView',
+      name: 'OverView',
+      // route level code-splitting
+      // this generates a separate chunk (About.[hash].js) for this route
+      // which is lazy-loaded when the route is visited.
+      component: () => import('../views/OverView.vue')
+    },
+    {
+      path: '/Item',
+      name: 'Item',
+      component: () => import('../views/Item.vue')
+    },
+  ]
+})
+import Cookies from 'js-cookie';
+router.beforeEach((to, from, next) => {
+  const token = Cookies.get('token');
+  if (to.path == '/login') {
+    next()
+  } else {
+    // 如果不是 /login，判断是否有 token
+    if (!token) {
+      // 如果没有，则跳至登录页面
+      next({ path: '/login' })
+      console.log('9999999')
+    } else {
+      // 否则继续执行
+      console.log('66666')
+      next()
+    }
+  }
+})
+
+export default router
